simplesect.title: What's new in 1.5.0
simplesect.para: Schema projects can be created from an existing schema from a directory server.
Schemas, object classes and attribute types can be merged between schema projects.
Besides these key new features, the Schema Editor plugin has received a number of bug fixes. A detailed report is provided in the Release Notes section.

simplesect.title: What's new in 1.4.0
simplesect.para: Apache Directory Studio is now fully internationalized. Out of the box English, French and German translations are provided.

simplesect.title: What's new in 1.2.0
simplesect.para: Apache Directory Studio 1.2.0 brings a better support for schema files. The schema file parser has been relaxed to allow non compliant schema files to be read correctly.

simplesect.title: What's new in 1.1.0

para.emphasis: New Hierarchical presentation in Schema view

simplesect.para:
The
Schema view
has been improved by the addition of a new Hierarchical presentation which displays the attribute types and object classes hierarchically.
The Schema Editor plugin now supports key bindings to launch several actions (e.g. "Open in Type Hierarchy").

The Schema Editor plugin now bundles the 'core' schemas of Open LDAP. When
creating a new project
, or
importing 'core' schemas
, the schemas from Open LDAP can be selected.

The
Hierarchy view
has been improved by the addition of the "Type Hierarchy" mode which displays at the same time both the element's Supertype and Subtype hierarchies.
Besides these key new features, the Schema Editor plugin has received a number of bug fixes. A detailed report is provided in the Release Notes section.
